body_html:
Vincent, thank you for your response! I did the following:

  1. downloaded 1_notmnist.ipynb from the "Assignment 1: notMNIST" page of the Deep Learning course (https://classroom.udacity.com/courses/ud730/lessons/6370362152/concepts/63703142310923)
  2. ran the Jupyter Notebook environment from Anaconda. Jupyter tab opened in Chrome
  3. put 1_notmnist.ipynb into a folder, visible through the "Files" tab of the environment
  4. found the file through the "Files" tab and clicked on it to open

P.S. Unfortunately my experience with Jupyter Notebooks is quite limited. Therefore it is likely that I am trying to open the file in a wrong way..

body:
Vincent, thank you for your response!  I did the following:

1) downloaded 1_notmnist.ipynb from the "Assignment 1: notMNIST" page of the Deep Learning course (https://classroom.udacity.com/courses/ud730/lessons/6370362152/concepts/63703142310923)
2) ran the Jupyter Notebook environment from Anaconda.  Jupyter tab opened in Chrome
3) put 1_notmnist.ipynb into a folder, visible through the "Files" tab of the environment
3) found the file through the "Files" tab and clicked on it to open

P.S. Unfortunately my experience with Jupyter Notebooks is quite limited.  Therefore it is likely that I am trying to open the file in a wrong way..
